14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited Al-Muhaqalah, Al-Muzabanah, Al-Mukhabarah, and making an exception (in a sale) unless it is made known." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih, Gharib from this route as narration of Yunus bin 'Ubaid, from 'Ata, from Jabir

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّهْىِ عَنِ الثُّنْيَا،
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prohibition From Making Exceptions
